name: x-accuracy-6
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s accuracy by six stages. This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Raises accuracy by six stages in battle. Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text.sword_shield: It raises the accuracy of a Pokémon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
